fact: that packing a lunch just TWICE a week instead of spending $10 at the local deli can save you $1,000+ per year?
that Wall Street is really named after a wall? It was a wooden barrier built in 1653 to protect the Dutch colonists who then ruled Manhattan from the British and Native Americans.
that Bill Gates told his Harvard University professors that he would be a millionaire by age 30? He became a billionaire at age 31.
